attributes.action: expand the rail system infrastructure to reduce road congestion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Build additional railway lines parallel to existing rail lines to take heavy goods vehicles off the roads. 
New railway lines can be built alongside motorways specifically to take goods vehicles and palleted cargo.
Distribution would be quicker, more efficient and goods depots would be set up for local distribution at rail points. With less road congestion and cleaner use of rail transport, this would also reduce pollution.
Incentives should be given to transport companies and to companies operating large fleets of vehicles, such as the Supermarket chains, Argos and manufacturing organisations to make use of the railways.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
